item.description:
Award-Winning British Commercials 2010

Introduction by Peter Bigg, Chief Executive, British Television Advertising Awards, on Sunday, December 5, at 3 pm

Boston is one of just 10 cities in the U.S. where you can see this annual showcase, now in its 32nd year, featuring winners of the British Television Advertising Awards. Described as “bite-size films” or “minute masterpieces,” (New York Times) these outstanding commercials in a range of categories offer a glimpse into the originality, wit, and creativity of British advertising.

(This is NOTHING like US advertising....as most Brits will already know!)

You can get to see the great ICA Exhibits too.... Let me know if you want to come earlier, as I probably will.

You will have to pay your own $10 admission fee for the commercials. I'm not sure if this includes admission to the exhibit halls also - but you might be able to get free ICA tickets from your local library for that..
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the foyer of the ICA at 2. 30. Talk is at 3 pm. I'll be holding a Meet up sign.
item.name: Award winning British Commercials at the ICA
